text: @ConservativeVoice#Ukraine'sEnergySector #EnergySecurity #FreeMarketPrinciplesTen years of war have had a profound impact on Ukraine's energy sector, but despite the challenges, they've made significant strides in strengthening their energy security & adopting European-style legislation. By embracing free-market principles, eliminating subsidies, and promoting transparency, Ukraine has shown remarkable resilience in the face of Russian aggression.
